ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: It s players like you that make me sick. Why the hell bother playing this game, if you need to cheat at it to have fun. Go bother someone else s game. Macabre
ygData.messageBody:
It's players like you that make me sick. Why the hell bother playing this
game, if you need to cheat at it to have fun. Go bother someone else's game.

Macabre
----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 11:38 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Ok, does anyone remember the days of Diablo where you'd just Alt-Tab over
to
> your cheat program?
>
> well, I was on ICQ the other day and I got a msg, and not thinking I
> alt-tab'ed once, nothing, twice and I was out of EQ.
>
> Now, my mouse was fairly locked up, but the key board still worked, I
could
> alt-tab between other programs. (only had ICQ open) when the
CTRL-ALT-DEL
> window came up (I pushed em) I could again use my mouse while it was up.
>
> when I tried to go back into EQ it didn't work, but it still takes time to
> camp out your character eh? :)
>
> I'm thinking this may be able to allow some cheat programs, but probably
> not, everything seems to me server side except for hot keys.
>
> But, I am not a good enough programmer to write something that might be
able
> to take advantage of this, nor do I know anyone who is. If you are give
> your input and see if anything works eh? hehehe...if anyone does figure
> something out they'd be a god to EQ cheaters :)
>
> hope something comes of this,
> Omeg
>
